it.polimi.se2019.view.selector

Class CLISelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.selector.CLISelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SelectorV

    public class CLISelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectorV
    implements the request to the user and the collection of the answers in cli
    Author:
    FedericoMainettiGambera, LudoLerma

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  CLISelector.AskBotMove
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user where they want the bot to be moved collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskBotShoot
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user whom he wants the bot to shoot then send the answer to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskEffectInputs
      implements a dedicated thread that takes care of displaying the possible input for a certain inputType then sends the answer to the server
      private class  CLISelector.AskFirstSpawnPosition
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user where they want to spawn, on the base of the color of the power up discarded, on their very first turn collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskGameSetUp
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user the information needed to set up the game as they desire collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskGrabStuffGrabWeapon
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user which weapon they want to pick up, if they can pick up any, collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskGrabStuffSwitchWeapon
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user which weapon they want to discard and which they want to collect collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskGrabSuffAction
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user if they want to grab where they are or move and grab somewhere else collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskNickaname
      implements a dedicated thread that manage to ask the user the nickname he wants to use and to check whether the said nickname is available or not then send the answer to the server
      private class  CLISelector.AskPaymentInformation
      implements a thread that manages to ask the user how they want to pay an item, then collect the answer and send it to the server
      private class  CLISelector.AskPlayerSetUp
      Deprecated.  
      private class  CLISelector.AskPowerUpToDiscard
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user which power up they want to discard collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskPowerUpToUse
      once the user choose they want to use a power up, this class manages to ask them which one they want to use between the ones they are holding in their hand, then send the answer to server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskRunAroundPosition
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user where they want to move collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskShootOrMove
      implements a dedicated thread which asks the user if he wants to move before shooting or just shooting collects the answer sends it to the server
      private class  CLISelector.AskShootReloadMove
      Deprecated.  
      private class  CLISelector.AskSpawn
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user where they want to spawn on the basis of the power up card he chooses to discard collects the answer sends it to the server
      private class  CLISelector.AskTagBackGranade
      implements the request of using tag back grenade
      private class  CLISelector.AskTargetingScope
      implements the request of using targeting scope
      private class  CLISelector.AskTurnAction 
      private class  CLISelector.AskWhatEffect
      implements a thread that manages to show the possible effect of a card then send the answer to the server by using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskWhatReaload
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user which weapon they want to reload collects the answer and sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.AskWhatWep
      implements a thread that manages to show the possible weapon for the user to use collects the answer then sends it to the server using a specific event
      private class  CLISelector.WantToUsePowerUpOrNot
      implements a dedicated thread that manages to ask the user whether he wants to use a power up or not, then send the answer to the server using a specific event
